nodes.text: The Tai'ni were native to the planet Di'tai'ni, two systems away from the Both system. They had many non-Tai'ni workers on their homeworld, including Trintic and Leresai. In 19 ABY, the Tai'ni government invited General Garm Bel Iblis to mediate a dispute between the Tai'ni and their non-Tai'ni workers. This turned out to be a ploy orchestrated by their allies, the Bothans, to get General Bel Iblis's forces (including Rogue Squadron) into the region to help protect Bothawui.
